column4: hi, i want to save a webpage for archiving purposes, and i tried file -> save page as... in firefox and the resulting page doesn't look right at all, is there a better programme for this purpose?
even a pdf or similar output is fine, doesn't have to be html
man wget.  there are lots of options depending on how you want to do it
if you just crontab -e, the line will work as-is
cron.monthly is a directory where you would just drop a script
